title: 104_s1307
content: The Act titled "Treatment of Indian Tribal Natural Resource Income Act of 1995" addresses the federal tax treatment of income derived by Indians from natural resources activities. It introduces a new section, SEC. 7874, in the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to govern the federal tax treatment of income derived by Indians from the harvest of tribally owned natural resources. The Act "Treatment of Indian Tribal Natural Resource Income Act of 1995" exempts income from natural resources activities conducted by Indian tribes or qualified Indian entities from income and self-employment taxes. It also exempts remuneration for services in natural resources activities within the tribe. The term "natural resources-related activity" includes activities related to cultivating, harvesting, processing, extracting, or selling natural resources held in trust by the United States for the tribe. The Act exempts income from natural resources activities conducted by Indian tribes or qualified Indian entities from income and self-employment taxes. A qualified Indian entity is defined as an entity engaged in natural resources-related activities of Indian tribes, with all equity interests owned by tribes or their members, and management functions performed by tribal members. The Act exempts income from natural resources activities conducted by Indian tribes or qualified Indian entities from income and self-employment taxes. A qualified Indian entity is defined as an entity engaged in natural resources-related activities of Indian tribes, with all equity interests owned by tribes or their members, and management functions performed by tribal members. Special rules apply for distributions from qualified Indian entities to tribal members. For the purposes of this section, distributions of equity interests in qualified Indian entities to tribal members are treated as income from natural resources activities. De minimis unrelated amounts may be excluded, and no inference is created regarding tax exemptions for income derived from tribal rights secured before January 1, 1995. Exemption from tax for income derived from tribal rights secured as of January 1, 1995, by any treaty, law, or Executive Order. Conforming Amendment to the tax code. Sec. 7874 addresses the federal tax treatment of income from the harvest of tribally owned natural resources. The amendments made by this section apply to periods before, on, or after the enactment of this Act.
